programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '70s - Peter Falk (10/5/73)
programme.desc: Catch a rack of iconic rumpled raincoats worn by 4-time Emmy winner Peter Falk in his detective show Columbo.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Best Of Richard Pryor (6/9/83)
programme.desc: Richard Pryor pokes fun at his failure at marriage and reflects on his new sobriety.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Comic Legends Of The '60s - Joan Rivers (12/13/78)
programme.desc: The legendary Joan Rivers talks giving birth and politics, but not necessarily at the same time.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Comic Legends Of The '90s - Bill Maher (11/3/89)
programme.desc: Stand-up comic Bill Maher describes growing up half Jewish and half Catholic.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Best Of Richard Pryor (10/9/86)
programme.desc: Richard Pryor discusses dropping 20 pounds for a movie role and driving his Ferrari across the US.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Comic Legends Of The '60s - Dom Deluise (3/6/73)
programme.desc: Dom Deluise on earthquakes, Bruno Vailati on sharks and Sally Kellerman on the Queen of England.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Very Best of Johnny and Guests - Jack Benny, Mel Blanc, Jim Henson & The Muppets (1/23/74)
programme.desc: Mel explains his signature cartoon voices, Jim Henson and Kermit the Frog sing "It's Not Easy Being Green."

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Very Best of Johnny and Guests - Michael Landon, Bill Withers, Suzanne Somers (2/21/74)
programme.desc: Bill Withers performs "Ain't No Sunshine When You're Gone," and Suzanne makes first Tonight Show appearance.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Very Best of Johnny and Guests - Gene Hackman, McLean Stevenson, George Carlin (3/21/74)
programme.desc: After a monologue touching on gas prices, Johnny welcomes MASH's McLean Stevenson.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Very Best of Johnny and Guests - Bob Hope, Joan Rivers, Michael Landon (9/24/74)
programme.desc: The audience corrects Johnny on when autumn began. Bob Hope has an anniversary special.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Very Best of Johnny and Guests - Suzanne Pleshette, Don Rickles (5/15/75)
programme.desc: Suzanne Pleshette had some misadventures in Hollywood. Don Rickles accidentally makes a spill on Johnny's desk.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Very Best of Johnny and Guests - Joan Rivers, Harvey Korman (9/17/75)
programme.desc: Johnny re-enacts the Hamilton and Burr duel. Joan Rivers admits to screaming during childbirth.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Very Best of Johnny and Guests - Don Rickles, Robert Blake, Desi Arnaz, Bob Hope (3/4/76)
programme.desc: Johnny sings Rhinestone Cowboy. Robert Blake talks Baretta, Don Rickles does his trademark insults.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Very Best of Johnny and Guests - Mel Brooks, The Smothers Brothers, Bob Uecker (7/29/76)
programme.desc: Mel Brooks remembers working in the Catskills and does the 2,000 Year Old Man with Johnny.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Very Best of Johnny and Guests - Lucille Ball, Jay Leno, Erma Bombeck (4/28/77)
programme.desc: Lucille Ball and Johnny talk about their legacies. Jay Leno does standup.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Very Best of Johnny and Guests - Rich Little, McLean Stevenson, Jean Marsh (5/12/78)
programme.desc: Johnny does his version of Mr. Rogers. Rich Little impersonates Johnny, McLean Stevenson is doing a new movie.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Very Best of Johnny and Guests - Dean Martin, Martin Mull (8/9/78)
programme.desc: Dean Martin sips on "apple juice" and Johnny samples it. Martin Mull plays a song in French.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Very Best of Johnny and Guests - Jack Benny, Mel Blanc, Jim Henson & The Muppets (1/23/74)
programme.desc: Mel explains his signature cartoon voices, Jim Henson and Kermit the Frog sing "It's Not Easy Being Green."

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Very Best of Johnny and Guests - Michael Landon, Bill Withers, Suzanne Somers (2/21/74)
programme.desc: Bill Withers performs "Ain't No Sunshine When You're Gone," and Suzanne makes first Tonight Show appearance.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Very Best of Johnny and Guests - Gene Hackman, McLean Stevenson, George Carlin (3/21/74)
programme.desc: After a monologue touching on gas prices, Johnny welcomes MASH's McLean Stevenson.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Very Best of Johnny and Guests - Bob Hope, Joan Rivers, Michael Landon (9/24/74)
programme.desc: The audience corrects Johnny on when autumn began. Bob Hope has an anniversary special.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Very Best of Johnny and Guests - Jim Fowler, Tom Hanks (4/8/82)
programme.desc: Carnac the Magnificent stops by. Wild Kingdom's Jim Fowler brings animals. Tom Hanks preps for fatherhood.
